channel.title: Sections on Anchored Marathon
channel.description: Recent content in Sections on Anchored Marathon

item.title: Race Info
item.description: “The Anchored Marathon” is a certified and sanctioned Boston Qualifying road marathon. The purpose of the event is to give Alaskan runners an opportunity to qualify for Boston 2021 in state. Race date is 8/15/2020. Start time is 9:00am. Race distance is 26.2 miles. The course starts and finishes at Goose Lake and consists of two out and backs. The first takes you out toward University Lake via the Chester Creek Trail where you will turn around at the roundabout near the southwest corner of the lake.
